TPReadObjects Class Reference

Maintains a database of all objects that have been read from the current object stream. More...

#include <tobjstrm.h>

Inheritance diagram for TPReadObjects::

List of all members.

Public Methods

void removeAll ()

Detailed Description

TPReadObjects maintains a database of all objects that have been read from the current object stream. This is used by ipstream when it reads a pointer from a stream to determine if other addresses for that objects exist.
